config.name: removeMask
config.desc:
True to create a single-use mask that is automatically destroyed after loading (useful for page loads),
False to persist the mask element reference for multiple uses (e.g., for paged data widgets).  Defaults to false.

config.name: items
config.desc: array of button configs or elements to add (will be converted to a MixedCollection)

config.name: mode
config.desc:
The shadow display mode. Supports the following options:
sides: Shadow displays on both sides and bottom only
frame: Shadow displays equally on all four sides
drop: Traditional bottom-right drop shadow (default)

config.name: tree
config.desc: The tree TreePanel, with config etc.

methods.name: each
methods.desc:
Iterates an array calling the passed function with each item, stopping if your function returns false. If the
passed array is not really an array, your function is called once with it.
The supplied function is called with (Object item, Number index, Array allItems).

methods.name: get

params.name: el
params.desc: The id of the node, a DOM Node or an existing Element.

methods.name: decode
methods.desc: Shorthand for {@link Roo.util.JSON#decode}

methods.name: getDom
methods.desc: Return the dom node for the passed string (id), dom node, or Roo.Element

methods.name: urlEncode
methods.desc: Takes an object and converts it to an encoded URL. e.g. Roo.urlEncode({foo: 1, bar: 2}); would return "foo=1&bar=2".  Optionally, property values can be arrays, instead of keys and the resulting string that's returned will contain a name/value pair for each array value.

methods.name: addBehaviors

params.name: obj
params.desc: The list of behaviors to apply

methods.name: factory

params.name: namespace
params.desc: (optional)

methods.name: apply
methods.desc: Copies all the properties of config to obj.

params.name: obj
params.desc: The receiver of the properties

params.name: config
params.desc: The source of the properties

params.name: defaults
params.desc: A different object that will also be applied for default values

methods.name: onReady
methods.desc: Fires when the document is ready (before onload and before images are loaded).  Shorthand of {@link Roo.EventManager#onDocumentReady}.

params.name: fn
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc: An  object that becomes the scope of the handler

params.name: override
params.desc:
If true, the obj passed in becomes
                            the execution scope of the listener

methods.name: select
methods.desc: Selects elements based on the passed CSS selector to enable working on them as 1.

params.name: selector
params.desc: The CSS selector or an array of elements

params.name: unique
params.desc: (optional) true to create a unique Roo.Element for each element (defaults to a shared flyweight object)

params.name: root
params.desc: (optional) The root element of the query or id of the root

methods.name: applyIf
methods.desc: Copies all the properties of config to obj if they don't already exist.

params.name: obj
params.desc: The receiver of the properties

params.name: config
params.desc: The source of the properties

methods.name: getCmp
methods.desc: Shorthand for {@link Roo.ComponentMgr#get}

methods.name: id
methods.desc: Generates unique ids. If the element already has an id, it is unchanged

params.name: el
params.desc: (optional) The element to generate an id for

params.name: prefix
params.desc: (optional) Id prefix (defaults "Roo-gen")

methods.name: encodeURIComponent
methods.desc: Safe version of encodeURIComponent

methods.name: encode
methods.desc: Shorthand for {@link Roo.util.JSON#encode}

methods.name: fly

params.name: el
params.desc: The dom node or id

params.name: named
params.desc:
(optional) Allows for creation of named reusable flyweights to
                                 prevent conflicts (e.g. internally Roo uses "_internal")

methods.name: isEmpty
methods.desc: Returns true if the passed value is null, undefined or an empty string (optional).

params.name: value
params.desc: The value to test

params.name: allowBlank
params.desc: (optional) Pass true if an empty string is not considered empty

methods.name: query
methods.desc: Selects an array of DOM nodes by CSS/XPath selector. Shorthand of {@link Roo.DomQuery#select}

params.name: path
params.desc: The selector/xpath query

params.name: root
params.desc: (optional) The start of the query (defaults to document).

methods.name: urlDecode
methods.desc: Takes an encoded URL and and converts it to an object. e.g. Roo.urlDecode("foo=1&bar=2"); would return {foo: 1, bar: 2} or Roo.urlDecode("foo=1&bar=2&bar=3&bar=4", true); would return {foo: 1, bar: [2, 3, 4]}.

params.name: overwrite
params.desc: (optional) Items of the same name will overwrite previous values instead of creating an an array (Defaults to false).

methods.name: escapeRe
methods.desc: Escapes the passed string for use in a regular expression

methods.name: extend
methods.desc:
Extends one class with another class and optionally overrides members with the passed literal. This class
also adds the function "override()" to the class that can be used to override
members on an instance.

params.name: subclass
params.desc: The class inheriting the functionality

params.name: superclass
params.desc: The class being extended

params.name: overrides
params.desc: (optional) A literal with members

methods.name: namespace
override

params.name: origclass
params.desc: The class to override

params.name: overrides
params.desc:
The list of functions to add to origClass.  This should be specified as an object literal
containing one or more methods.

methods.name: selectNode
methods.desc:
Selects a single element as a Roo Element
This is about as close as you can get to jQuery's $('do crazy stuff')

params.name: selector
params.desc: The selector/xpath query

params.name: root
params.desc: (optional) The start of the query (defaults to document).

methods.name: type
methods.desc:
Returns the type of object that is passed in. If the object passed in is null or undefined it return false otherwise it returns one of the following values:
  • string: If the object passed is a string
  • number: If the object passed is a number
  • boolean: If the object passed is a boolean value
  • function: If the object passed is a function reference
  • object: If the object passed is an object
  • array: If the object passed is an array
  • regexp: If the object passed is a regular expression
  • element: If the object passed is a DOM Element
  • nodelist: If the object passed is a DOM NodeList
  • textnode: If the object passed is a DOM text node and contains something other than whitespace
  • whitespace: If the object passed is a DOM text node and contains only whitespace
